name.description: Identifies the asset to which this NFT represents

description.description: Describes the asset to which this NFT represents

image.description: A URI pointing to a ressource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this NFT represents. Consider making any image at a width betweeb 320 and 1090 pixels and aspect ration between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive√©

color.description: Colour of Tea variety to which this NFT represents

usage.description: Indication on usual usage for tea variety to which this NFT represents

rare.description: Numerical Indicator representing raribility of this item in collection between 0(current item) and 100(unique)
